Newbie Guide:

To the south of the Kamael Village there is a place called the Hill of Hope. There lies our first settlement in these lands. Many go there to honor the memory of our people.

Go there to absorb the ancient power. It will help you start hunting monsters once again, though you haven't done it for a long time now.

The Hill of Hope is inhabited by small and relatively calm animals. Hunt them to hone your rusted skills.

Kill 20 Grey Keltirs, Elder Grey Keltirs, Black Wolves and Elder Black Wolves. Then come back to me.
